message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product we're discussing is not just any item; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and value. Given its significance, I believe it's worth more than what most people would pay for it. Considering its true worth to you, I propose a fair price of $12000. This offer allows you to acquire something truly special without breaking the bank, while also ensuring a fair return for me. I look forward to your positive response.
